author: jszakmeister
msg: Fix Issue #2226 (exporting deleted directories from wc produces empty dirs).
This also fixes 'svn export -rBASE' from the working copy with items scheduled
for deletion,  Added a couple of tests so that we avoid breaking these in the
(copy_one_versioned_file): Don't export deleted files when exporting at
revision WORKING from a working copy.  Updated the comment accordingly.
(copy_versioned_files): Don't export deleted files when exporting at
revision WORKING from a working copy.  Updated the comment accordingly.
Also, stop walking through the main working copy area to collect the list of
files to export, and use the entries files instead.
Remove a couple of files and directories to test a couple more edge cases in

author: nori
msg: Add more gettext support for subversion/libsvn_repos/load.c.
* subversion/libsvn_repos/load.c: Mark up some strings for gettext

author: nori
msg: Refactor a message output in executing 'svnadmin dump' into two messages
for localizability because the old message can be only partly translated.
Now translators can translate two whole messages correctly.
(svn_repos_dump_fs2): Divide a message with a conditional expression

author: kou
msg: The reason is the result of the following command:
Remove no reason require that is 'require "svn/fs"'.
